title: Riot Games at EB Expo

embed.description: EB Expo - Australian Video Games Expo | October 2 - 4, 2015

body: Is Riot Games going to be at the EB Games Expo this year in October? The tickets are currently on sale and I was wondering if Riot Games will be attending.

replies.body: they where there last year but it was to watch the worlds/ people could play for fun on stage. they also had free skins and lanyards.
